analysis.description:
ERC20Basic (/unique_chucks/33/0x76c9df527806c229ce63bc660d41ac59bc50ad5c.sol#45-53) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/33/0x76c9df527806c229ce63bc660d41ac59bc50ad5c.sol#47-48)

ERC20 (/unique_chucks/33/0x76c9df527806c229ce63bc660d41ac59bc50ad5c.sol#53-61) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/33/0x76c9df527806c229ce63bc660d41ac59bc50ad5c.sol#54-55)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/33/0x76c9df527806c229ce63bc660d41ac59bc50ad5c.sol#55-56)

Reentrancy in VT201811004.release (/unique_chucks/33/0x76c9df527806c229ce63bc660d41ac59bc50ad5c.sol#141-157):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(_beneficiary[i],_amount[i].mul(10 ** 18)) (/unique_chucks/33/0x76c9df527806c229ce63bc660d41ac59bc50ad5c.sol#145-153)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _amount (/unique_chucks/33/0x76c9df527806c229ce63bc660d41ac59bc50ad5c.sol#154-155)

VT201811004.release has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(_beneficiary[i],_amount[i].mul(10 ** 18)) (/unique_chucks/33/0x76c9df527806c229ce63bc660d41ac59bc50ad5c.sol#145-153)

VT201811004.setUserInfo (/unique_chucks/33/0x76c9df527806c229ce63bc660d41ac59bc50ad5c.sol#128-139) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= _locktime (/unique_chucks/33/0x76c9df527806c229ce63bc660d41ac59bc50ad5c.sol#132-139)

VT201811004.release (/unique_chucks/33/0x76c9df527806c229ce63bc660d41ac59bc50ad5c.sol#141-157) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _unlocktime (/unique_chucks/33/0x76c9df527806c229ce63bc660d41ac59bc50ad5c.sol#143-157)

VT201811004.checkRelease (/unique_chucks/33/0x76c9df527806c229ce63bc660d41ac59bc50ad5c.sol#161-169) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _unRelease == 0 && block.timestamp >= _unlocktime (/unique_chucks/33/0x76c9df527806c229ce63bc660d41ac59bc50ad5c.sol)
